channel.title: CVE Feed for The Events Calendar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Events Calendar -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24715|2024-05-17T08:48:05.463Z -- The Events Calendar -- BookIt
item.description: Improper Validation of Specified Quantity in Input vulnerability in The Events Calendar BookIt allows Manipulating Hidden Fields.This issue affects BookIt: from n/a through 2.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31433|2024-04-15T09:29:42.078Z -- The Events Calendar -- The Events Calendar
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in The Events Calendar.This issue affects The Events Calendar: from n/a through 6.3.0.
